error.title: Error

http.403: You are not authorized to access this page.
http.405: The HTTP verb you used is not supported for this URL.

error.concurrencyFailure: Another user modified this data at the same time as you. Your changes were rejected.

payment.title: Cancel or problem with the payment process.
payment.content:
The payment was not processed!
You were not charged.
You may try again
payment.okMessage: We created a free account for you, please check your email to login.
